alert.note: Alert for Macomb (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 4:29PM EST until January 27 at 3:24AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Clinton River Near Clinton Township affecting Macomb County. For the Clinton River...including Clinton Township, Mt. Clemens... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Clinton River near Clinton Township. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 17.0 feet and falling. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 230 AM EST.
